titles.title: To amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act to provide for the appointment of the ranking members of the Committee on the District of Columbia of the House of Representatives and the Subcommittee on General Services, Federalism, and the District of Columbia of the Committee on Governmental Affairs of the Senate to the National Capital Planning Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on District of Columbia.

committee.name: House Committee on District of Columbia

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Operations and Metropolitan Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/16/1994--Introduced. Amends the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act to provide for the appointment of the ranking members of the Committees on the District of Columbia for the Senate and the House of Representatives to the National Capital Planning Commission.
